They describe it as nicely made, perfectly sized, and flattering, with one mentioning it doesn't add bulk to the hips. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for shorter ladies! So elegant!
items.body: I LOVE this dress! I've tried other brands who offer a similar smocked bodice and they're all too long in the torso or too tight. This dress is perfect! No punching or puckering. It is so comfortable and the fabric is beautiful! Also the quality of construction is high. I'm 5ft 3in with a 40in bust/36DD, 29 in waist, usually a Med, size 10 top and a 4 or 6 bottom. I got the large and it fits well. I based my size on the waist measurement and hem length not the bust. Sleeves aren't too long and the hem hits right above my ankles which is my preference. Also the pockets are well placed and do not add bulk to your hips. This is perfect for the office, an interview or the board room with a blazer, a wedding or shower, for church or an after 5 event. It's a must have for your closet. So versatile. My only drawback is there is NO lining and the background of the material is semi-sheer. Because it is see through, you must wear a half slip. Everything shows. The smocked bodice is not see through. Even so I'm giving it 5 stars for all that is right with the dress! Get yours today! Read more
items.author: Karen D. McConnico

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great dress--fabric is so nice~
items.body: This is truly an adorable dress. The fabric is quality (I'm a seamstress, so I always look for that). It also does not have any rayon in it, so shrinkage and wrinkles will be next to none. The fabric actually has a bit of texture to it, so the print pattern has a bit of raised texture which enhances the whole look. I'm 5'6", 135 lbs., and the small fit me perfectly. If I had one complaint, I'd say the sleeves could be a inch or two longer for mid-to tall gals like me. Overall length hit me mid-calf. Perfect dress for fall/winter, and the caramel color looks AMAZING with a darker jean vest or jacket. Read more
items.author: Joyce M.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you love dresses, buy this one!!
items.body: The Fall Midi dress is designed for comfort and style. I ordered it in three colors for this fall season. The colors are true to the pictures and the dress is exactly as described. I appreciate that there was no change in the quality between the colors which sometimes happens. I am 5'--162lbs and ordered a L which fits well. It almost falls at my ankles but I expected that and actually prefer that length. The sleeves come to the wrist plus the neckline maintains its modest coverage. The material is lightweight and very flowy, it moves beautifully with me as I walk. The material is not see through and the flower motif is outlined by stitching giving the dress texture and interest. It is comfortable to wear and easily pairs with a sweater or jean jacket. I am glad I got additional colors and am thinking to pick up a few in colors for Spring. True quality control makes this an outstanding dress. It is priced well and I wouldn't hesitate to order more and to recommend this style and seller. They have earned their 5 stars. Read more
items.author: Dee

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice material and fit
items.body: This is a beautiful dress in the light blue. It is better quality material than I expected. I am 5’3, 120 lbs and a little busty. I ordered a small and it fits well. I didn’t give it a 5 because the sewing isn’t great. The underarm is buckled and there are several loose threads around the neckline. I may exchange it and see if a different dress might be better sewn. It is very flattering and is dressy enough for special occasions but not a black tie affair. Read more
items.author: audie m ward

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great quality and fits nicely
items.body: I bought this dress for my granddaughter's wedding. It was perfect and I got a lot of compliments on it. I love the texture of the fabric and I'm impressed with the quality. It fits nicely. I'm 5'2" and it came just a few inches off the floor, which was fine for a wedding, although I plan to wear it other places. I hung it up but noticed a lot of wrinkles from the packaging, so I just steamed them out and it looked amazing. I would never iron this dress, even on the wrong side, because it would compromise the fabric and the fray areas around the flowers. Take the time to use a steamer. Read more
items.author: Bette C.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The perfect dress
items.body: Comfortable and beautiful color. This dress has texture, style, comfort, and can be worn all day. Buying more in different colors. True to size and the length is perfect for short boots for fall Read more
items.author: DoriK

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful dress!
items.body: Love this dress. I am LDS and bought it in white to use for a temple dress. It's perfect, lightweight and very comfortable. The white one is lined so it's not see thru. I'm 5'0 tall, 165# and a large fit me perfectly stopping at about ankle length on me. The only question I have is, here in the description it says to hang to dry, the tag that came with it said to dry on low heat, so I'm not sure what to do. I don't want it to shrink so I may just be safe and hang to dry. Read more
items.author: AmazonAddict

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty and comfortable.
items.body: The dress is a pretty as it looks in the picture, and the fit is perfect, although the sleeves are a bit long. It's also very comfortable and it has pockets. Read more
items.author: Jodi

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Green, Wine, Pink, Rust, White, Blue, Yellow, Apricot, Black, Caramel, Dusty Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
